title: AI and Machine Translation: The End of Language Barriers?
description: One-minute skill: AI and Machine Translation: The End of Language Barriers?.

hook.text: Real-time AI translation is here. Does that mean we'll never need to learn foreign languages again?

buildup.text: Tools like Google Translate and DeepL handle simple text well. Real-time speech translation is improving fast.

punchline.text: AI can translate words. It can't translate what it feels like to think in another tongue.
